article_title: Record-Breaking Gravitational Wave GW250114 Confirms Einstein's General Relativity

content_preview.title: Record-Breaking Gravitational Wave GW250114 Confirms Einstein's General Relativity
content_preview.summary: Clearest gravitational wave ever detected from black hole merger validates Einstein's theory with unprecedented precision
content_preview.body_excerpt:
## Overview

A groundbreaking gravitational wave detection is providing scientists with the most precise test yet of Albert Einstein's theory of general relativity. The signal, designated GW250114, originated from a collision between two massive black holes approximately 1.3 billion light-years from Earth and represents the clearest gravitational wave ever recorded from such an event.

## What We Know

The gravitational wave reached the Laser Interferometer Gravitational-Wave Observatory (LIGO) ...
